Articles.Content: I'm basically using MechJeb most of the time for most of my KSP activities.

Hi! Welcome aboard! I hope you will enjoy your stay!

When I was first playing KSP, I used MJ too. I learned how to establish an orbit, land, dock, rendezvous, etc by watching MJ do it.

I still use it though.

Happy launching!
Welcome. Normally there are more people saying hello, but they're all playing the new update. So, enjoy your stay!

Welcome. Normally there are more people saying hello, but they're all playing the new update. So, enjoy your stay!

And one of the people not playing the new update is me I'll buy the game next Tuesday.
It's seriously worth it I'm enjoying every second of it.

If you are really having trouble getting into Kerbin orbit, you can watch one of Scott Manley's very informative videos on the YouTube. They range from building a ship to landing on a planet. Have fun!
